title: The Road to Glory
description: A young woman blinded in a car accident loses her faith but finds happiness with a man who helps her restore it.

title: Fig Leaves
description: The story of Adam and Eve is juxtaposed with a modern day couple in New York City, drawing parallels in marital strife.

title: The Cradle Snatchers
description: Three middle-aged housewives, tired of being ignored by their husbands, decide to teach them a lesson by dating college boys.

title: Paid to Love
description: An American banker tries to find a wife for a Balkan crown prince to ensure the country's financial stability.

title: A Girl in Every Port
description: Two sailors who are rivals over women in various ports eventually become best friends.

title: Fazil
description: An Arab prince marries a Parisienne woman, but their cultural differences lead to tragedy.

title: The Air Circus
description: Two young pilots compete for the affection of their flight instructor's sister while training at an aviation school.

title: Trent's Last Case
description: An amateur detective investigates the murder of a financier and falls in love with the victim's widow.

title: The Dawn Patrol
description: The commander of a Royal Flying Corps squadron in World War I fights to keep his men alive despite high casualties.

title: The Criminal Code
description: A district attorney who sent a young man to prison becomes the warden of that same prison and faces a dilemma when he falls in love with the warden's daughter.

title: The Crowd Roars
description: A champion auto racer tries to prevent his younger brother from following in his dangerous footsteps.

title: Scarface
description: An ambitious and violently insane gangster climbs the ladder of success in the mob, but his weaknesses prove to be his downfall.

title: Tiger Shark
description: A tuna fisherman loses his hand to a shark but continues to fish, only to find his wife falling in love with his best friend.

title: Today We Live
description: During World War I, an aristocratic British girl falls in love with an American flyer while her brother and fiancé fight in torpedo boats.

title: Twentieth Century
description: A flamboyant Broadway director tries to win back his former star actress during a train ride on the Twentieth Century Limited.

title: Barbary Coast
description: A woman arrives in San Francisco during the gold rush to find her fiancé killed, and becomes involved with the powerful saloon owner who runs the town.

title: Ceiling Zero
description: Irresponsible mail pilots risk their lives and the lives of others in dangerous weather conditions, leading to tragedy.

title: The Road to Glory
description: During World War I, a French regiment's commander and his lieutenant rival for the affection of a nurse amidst the horrors of trench warfare.

title: Come and Get It
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Supporting Role
description: A lumber baron ruthlessly rises to power but later tries to recapture the love of the woman he abandoned by pursuing her daughter.

title: Bringing Up Baby
description: A paleontologist waiting for a dinosaur bone is beset by a flighty heiress and her pet leopard.

title: Only Angels Have Wings
description: At a remote South American trading port, the manager of an air freight service is forced to risk his pilots' lives in order to win a contract.

title: His Girl Friday
description: A newspaper editor uses every trick in the book to keep his ace reporter ex-wife from remarrying.

title: Sergeant York
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Leading Role
description: A Tennessee farmer and marksman is drafted in World War I and struggles with his pacifist beliefs before becoming a celebrated war hero.

title: Ball of Fire
description: A group of professors working on a new encyclopedia encounter a mouthy nightclub singer who is wanted by the police to help bring down her mobster boyfriend.

title: Air Force
description: The crew of a B-17 bomber arrives in Hawaii just as the Japanese attack Pearl Harbor, and is sent into action against the enemy.

title: To Have and Have Not
description: A cynical American expatriate in Martinique is persuaded to help the French Resistance and falls for a wandering singer.

title: The Big Sleep
description: Private detective Philip Marlowe is hired by a rich family to investigate a blackmail case involving the family's youngest daughter, leading him into a complex web of murder and deception.

title: Red River
description: A tyrannical cattle baron drives his herd and men to the breaking point, causing a mutiny led by his adopted son.

title: A Song Is Born
description: A professor of musicology learns about jazz from a nightclub singer on the run from the mob.

title: I Was a Male War Bride
description: A French Army captain marries an American WAC, but must overcome bureaucratic obstacles and gender stereotypes to accompany her back to the United States.

title: The Big Sky
description: Two frontiersmen join a keelboat expedition up the Missouri River to trade with the Blackfoot Indians, encountering danger and romance along the way.

title: Monkey Business
description: A chemist finds a rejuvenation formula that makes him and his wife act like teenagers.

title: O. Henry's Full House
description: An anthology film containing five stories by O. Henry; Hawks directed 'The Ransom of Red Chief' about two con men who kidnap a hellion boy.

title: Gentlemen Prefer Blondes
description: Two singers, best friends, take a cruise to Paris, where they are pursued by a private detective hired by the father of one of the girls' fiancé.

title: Land of the Pharaohs
description: Pharaoh Khufu commands the construction of the Great Pyramid, but court intrigue and his second wife's ambition threaten his plans.

title: Rio Bravo
description: A small-town sheriff in the American West enlists the help of a cripple, a drunk, and a young gunfighter in his efforts to hold in jail the brother of the local bad guy.

title: Hatari!
description: A group of men who catch wild animals in Africa for zoos find their profession and their camaraderie disrupted by the arrival of a female photographer.

title: Man's Favorite Sport?
description: A renowned fishing expert, who has never actually fished, is entered into a fishing tournament by his boss.

title: Red Line 7000
description: The professional and romantic lives of three stock car racing drivers and their girlfriends.

title: El Dorado
description: Cole Thornton, a gunfighter for hire, joins forces with an old friend, Sheriff J.P. Harrah, to help a rancher and his family fight a rival rancher trying to steal their water.

title: Rio Lobo
description: After the Civil War, a former Union Colonel teams up with a former Confederate officer to search for the traitors who sold information to the enemy.
